thread.title: Ebba Svensson
thread.title_full: Giant Vintage Sunglasses reviewed by Ebba Svensson

author: Ebba Svensson
title: Ebba Svensson
text: Recieved 2 pairs of glasses with free shipping in just a few days, even though i live in Sweden. The glasses look amazing and are of very nice quality, look true to pictures. Tracking my order was easy and cooperated good with the Swedish system. Highly recommend!
